&haM dE#vayaqjyayE$ndriyAqvI BU#yAsaqmityA#hEndriyAqvyE#va Ba#vati mahEqndrasyAq&haM dE#vayaqjyayA# jEqmAna#M mahiqmAna#M gamEyaqmityA#ha jEqmAna#mEqva ma#hiqmAna#M gacCatyaqgnEH svi#ShTaqkRutOq&haM dE#vayaqjyayA&&yu#ShmAn. yaqj~jEna# pratiqShThAM ga#mEyaqmityAqhAyu#rEqvAtman dha#ttEq prati# yaqj~jEna#-tiShThati || 45
(praqtiqShThA-ma#hvaqdastu#-viqdyuta#M-~MvasaqntaM-tEnaiqvE-ndra#syAq-ShTAtri(gm)#Sacca) (A11)
